title: CheckoutModePositiveResponse
description: This model describes the success scenario for checkout UI.

success.description: This will be true in case if the checkout UI passes.

responseCode.description: Depending on status of success level response code vary from 200 to 205

message.description: This will show the reason of success.

data.description: Data will have a property of RefrenceId

ReferenceID.description: This is a reconcillation ID generated by payment gateway.
